video

Plug the numbers into the expressions.


  1. Lower bound = \(~0.6262-2\sqrt{\frac{(0.6262)(1-0.6262)}{206}} ~=~ 0.5587825\)
  2. Upper bound = \(~0.6262+2\sqrt{\frac{(0.6262)(1-0.6262)}{206}} ~=~ 0.6936175\)
